data.meanings: To roll up, fold, wrap, involve, conjoin, be entangled (trees), be heaped, joined thick/dense and luxuriant/abundant.
data.sentence: The word وَالْتَفَّتِ comes from the root ل ف ف and is associated with the meanings: To roll up, fold, wrap, involve, conjoin, be entangled (trees), be heaped, joined thick/dense and luxuriant/abundant.

data.meanings: to drive/impel/urge. yusaquna - they are driven or led. saiqun - driver. suq (pl. aswaq) - market, stem, leg, kashafat an saqaiha (27:44) is a well known Arabic idiom meaning to become prepared to meet the difficulty or to become perturbed/perplexed or taken aback, the literal meaning is "she uncovered and bared her shanks". yukshafu an saqin (68:42) means ther eis severe affliction and the truth laid here, it is indicative of a grievous and terrible calamity and difficulty. masaq - the act of driving.
data.sentence: The word السَّاقُ comes from the root س و ق and is associated with the meanings: to drive/impel/urge. yusaquna - they are driven or led. saiqun - driver. suq (pl. aswaq) - market, stem, leg, kashafat an saqaiha (27:44) is a well known Arabic idiom meaning to become prepared to meet the difficulty or to become perturbed/perplexed or taken aback, the literal meaning is "she uncovered and bared her shanks". yukshafu an saqin (68:42) means ther eis severe affliction and the truth laid here, it is indicative of a grievous and terrible calamity and difficulty. masaq - the act of driving.

data.sentence: The word بِالسَّاقِ comes from the root س و ق and is associated with the meanings: to drive/impel/urge. yusaquna - they are driven or led. saiqun - driver. suq (pl. aswaq) - market, stem, leg, kashafat an saqaiha (27:44) is a well known Arabic idiom meaning to become prepared to meet the difficulty or to become perturbed/perplexed or taken aback, the literal meaning is "she uncovered and bared her shanks". yukshafu an saqin (68:42) means ther eis severe affliction and the truth laid here, it is indicative of a grievous and terrible calamity and difficulty. masaq - the act of driving.
